text:
Curalate www.curalate.com (All ROLES CAN SIT IN SEATTLE, NYC OR PHILLY)

Curalate is the leading marketing and analytics suite for the visual web. We sit at the intersection of big data and computer vision and we help brands create authentic connections with consumers through images.

Curalate was just named one of the nation’s 25 Hottest “under-the-radar startups” by Business Insider
